net.proteusframework.ui.mcolumn

Interface MTreeColumn

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractColumn, FixedValueColumn, PropertyColumn

    public interface MTreeColumn
    Represents a MIWT column that can be used in a tree model.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<?> getColumnClass()
      Gets the type of data contained in the column.
      net.proteusframework.core.locale.TextSource getColumnName()
      Gets the name of the column.
      Comparator<?> getComparator()
      Gets the comparator for sorting this column.
      String getDisplayClass()
      Get an optional display class.
      net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric getMaximumWidth()
      Gets the maximum width the column requires.
      net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric getMinimumWidth()
      Gets the minimum width the column requires.
      Object getValue(TreePath path)
      Gets the value.
      boolean isValueEditable(TreePath path)
      Return true if the path is editable.
      void setValue(TreePath path, Object value)
      Set value.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        Object getValue(TreePath path)
        Gets the value.
        Parameters:
        path - the path.
        Returns:
        the value or null if no value is available for the specified path.

      • isValueEditable

        boolean isValueEditable(TreePath path)
        Return true if the path is editable.
        Parameters:
        path - the path.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • setValue

        void setValue(TreePath path,
            Object value)
        Set value.
        Parameters:
        path - the path.
        value - the value for the column.

      • getColumnClass

        Class<?> getColumnClass()
        Gets the type of data contained in the column.
        Returns:
        the type. Never null.

      • getColumnName

        net.proteusframework.core.locale.TextSource getColumnName()
        Gets the name of the column.
        Returns:
        the name. Never null.

      • getComparator

        Comparator<?> getComparator()
        Gets the comparator for sorting this column.
        Returns:
        the comparator.

      • getDisplayClass

        String getDisplayClass()
        Get an optional display class.
        Returns:
        the HTML class name or null.

      • getMaximumWidth

        net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric getMaximumWidth()
        Gets the maximum width the column requires.
        Returns:
        the width or null if not specified.

        Returns:
        the width or null if not specified.
